full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
**Independent Review of Digital Transformation Projects (DTS)**

## Brief Overview
Elections Canada invites bidders to provide independent project review services for various Digital Transformation (DTS) projects. The selected contractor will conduct an independent review of the projects, assessing their current status and readiness for progress.

## Request for Proposal (RFP)
The RFP is open to Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Suppliers under [EN578-170432](#). This agreement is refreshed quarterly. Interested parties can find more information on how to become "Qualified SA Holders" by contacting [rcnmdai.-ncrimos@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:rcnmdai.-ncrimos@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

## Key Details
- **Contractor Type**: External Independent IT Project Review Team
- **Services Required**: Independent review of DTS projects, assessing the current status and readiness for progress
- **Duration**: The contract will run from the Effective Date to [MM/DD/2027](#).
- **Extension Options**: Elections Canada has the option to extend the contract by two additional periods of one year each.

## Security Clearance
The contractor shall meet the minimum corporate security clearance requirements of DOS - Reliability and resource security clearance of Reliability status.

## Submission Requirements
Bidders must submit a complete RFP response using the Connect service provided by Canada Post Corporation. The RFP document and submission instructions are outlined in Part 2 - Bidder Instructions and Part 3 - Proposal Preparation Instructions. Proposals should be addressed to the Contracting Authority and sent to the Proposal Receiving Unit by the closing date and time.

## Enquiries
All enquiries and communications with Elections Canada personnel must be directed to the Contracting Authority. Bidders must submit written enquiries to [proposal@elections.ca](mailto:proposal@elections.ca) before the specified deadline.

## Important Notes
- This RFP allows for the procurement under the following Trade Agreements: CETA, CFTA, WTO GPA, Canada-Panama FTA, Canada-Korea FTA, Canada-Honduras FTA, Canada-Chile FTA, Canada-Ukraine FTA, CPTPP, Canada-Peru FTA, and Canada-Colombia FTA.
- The selected contractor will report to the Contracting Authority.
- Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) is a quarterly refreshed agreement. Please contact [rcnmdai.-ncrim
